resources.string: Are you sure you want to close me?
You need a valid API Key and Secret, too!
between a timespan the App is optimized for a dark environment
click here to go to user
click here to go to XYZ

Click on content to see the imageful total #XYZ tweet. If the full tweet is loaded, a click opens or plays media or it opens a website. You need your own API-Key and API-Secret to run this app. Use the preferences (options menu) to add these keys.
The Twitter request was with stupid. You need a *VALID* API-key and API-Secret to run this app. Use the preferences in the left sidebar to add these keys.
the username, who retweet this tweet
Because you may changed some important preferences, it is better to restart the App.
Twitter Session fail. Maybe your API Key & Secret is wrong?
This is ReoTwé, a unofficial very reduced twitter client.
You became hooked on social media and Twitter? If you want to change it, try this App. No likes, no retweets, no comments, no notifications to pretend you from addiction.
… if you want to take a picture, the App needs cam access (but not file access!)
Normally all twitter client request go to a man in the middle to analyse and cache every request.
WE DO NOT WANT this man in the middle server, who holds API Key and Secret and sending Ad\'s or do things with our private stuff!
Your CLIENT ReoTwé have to hold this Keys and YOU have to generate your own Keys! Visit apps.twitter.com
There are request limits to pretend the original twitter servers from to many requests.
I have to create slides to give hints to API Key, usage and (anti)features
If you need more hints about API Key and other stuff, visit me on %1$s
